message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it, and I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $1100000. What do you think?

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your serious offer, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more than that to make it worth my while. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1050000. What do you think?

Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $1050000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of $975000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher. What do you think?
